metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8174 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
napi_get_value_string_*() allows various kinds of memory corruption in node < 10.21.0, 12.18.0, and < 14.4.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8174` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nodejs - 8.10.0~dfsg-2ubuntu0.4+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nodejs package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.10.0~dfsg-2ubuntu0.4+esm2').
